Title: Hail, Caesar!
Overview: When a Hollywood star mysteriously disappears in the middle of filming, the studio sends their fixer to get him back.
production_companies: Universal Pictures, Mike Zoss Productions, Working Title Films
Cast: Josh Brolin, George Clooney, Alden Ehrenreich
